roleset.name: ride in a boat

roles.note: No realizations found with mention of boater, or really any arguments. But it seems possible.

roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01. Comparison to verb entry boat.01, which maps to VN class 51.4.1. No FrameNet entry for noun.

example.name: no arguments
example.text: I think urban culture has recently adopted boating in a major way .
